name: Falling Bot
description:
UPDATED VERSION (4/9/2018): https://drive.google.com/file/d/10gaLgFTr--V_LgdksALAowhcX_k_SF3U/view?usp=shari...

Simple game where you must steer the falling bot using 2 magnets with different power levels.

Controls are:

 Left Mouse Click: Increase Left Magnet Attraction force.

Right Mouse Click: Increase Right Magnet Attraction force.
